verses.text: \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H3068"\w* ever.

Praise ye \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H1004"\w* ever.

\w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* lords: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever.
\w Who|strong="H3478"\w* alone doth great wonders: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* mercy endureth \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever.

\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heavens \w in|strong="H0430"\w* understanding: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever.

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* established \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* above \w the|strong="H3605"\w* waters: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H0776"\w* ever.
\w Who|strong="H0776"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* great lights: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3318"\w* mercy endureth \w for|strong="H0776"\w* ever.

\w The|strong="H5704"\w* sun \w to|strong="H5704"\w* rule \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* day: \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* mercy endureth \w for|strong="H4714"\w* \w ever|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* moon \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* stars \w to|strong="H7971"\w* rule \w the|strong="H3605"\w* night: \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mercy endureth \w for|strong="H7971"\w* ever.

\w Who|strong="H4428"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* Egypt \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w their|strong="H5221"\w* firstborn: \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* mercy endureth \w for|strong="H4428"\w* ever.
\w Who|strong="H3605"\w* brought Israel \w from|strong="H0567"\w* among them: \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mercy endureth \w for|strong="H3605"\w* ever.

\w With|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* mighty \w hand|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* stretched out arm: \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* mercy endureth \w for|strong="H0776"\w* ever.

\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* divided \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Red Sea into parts: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* brought \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* midst thereof: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* overthrew Pharao \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* host \w in|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* Red Sea: \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* mercy endureth \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w ever|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H3808"\w* led \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w through|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* desert: \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* mercy endureth \w for|strong="H3808"\w* ever.
\w Who|strong="H0369"\w* smote great kings: \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* mercy endureth \w for|strong="H3808"\w* ever.
\w And|strong="H3605"\w* slew strong kings: \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mercy endureth \w for|strong="H3605"\w* ever.
Sehon king \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Amorrhites: \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H1004"\w* ever.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Og king \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Basan: \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H1004"\w* ever.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* gave \w their|strong="H3068"\w* land \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* inheritance: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* endureth \w for|strong="H3068"\w* ever.
For an inheritance to his servant Israel: for his mercy endureth for ever.
For he was mindful of us in our affliction: for his mercy endureth for ever.
And he redeemed us from our enemies: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Who giveth food to all flesh: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Give glory to the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Give glory to the Lord of lords: for his mercy endureth for ever.
